website_summaries.verdict: A more traditional-looking, vintage storage solution for a home office. Can be used elsewhere in the house as well.
pros: Various drawers provide different sizes to organize item
Large drawers are great for awkward objects
cons: It's size may not fit well in a traditional office setup

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Odor
customer_reviews.text: Item has a TERRIBLE chemical-like smell that permeates the entire house. I've had it sitting on the porch for 3 days to air out. No luck, still can't have it in the house because the smell is so bad.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy, small
customer_reviews.text: These look really cute. Exactly what I was looking for. They were fairly easy to put together. The hardest part was the drawers because you’re trying to hold 3 pieces in line and screw in a screw at same time. Easier with 2 people (my 7 yo helped). But definitely doable alone. The only negative is how small the drawers are. They really don’t fit much as seen from the photo. But for the price and how they look they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: A much needed addition to my bathroom. It was delivered promptly. It was easy to put together but took a little time. Directions were clear. Pieces fit together perfectly. Manufacturer included some extra screws. Lightweight. Quality is OK for the price. Functional. The only concern is that there is not drawer stop, so if you slide the drawers out too far, they come all the way out of the cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Soleil S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly was I was looking for! Doesn't take up much space but the drawers are decent sized. It was easy to assemble. Took me about an hour by myself. It is a little wobbly if you lean on it but otherwise pretty sturdy. I have a few items on top and they dont topple or move when I open drawers etc. Just received yesterday so at this point can't testify to the longevity or durability but so far very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother! Breaks during assembly + incorrect pieces
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy - bolt broke during installation causing the bottom to be wobbly. They also included an incorrect piece to a drawer, not allowing the “drawer stop” to be installed, and causing the drawer to not be secure.. Spend more and get a better product. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The intructions could be a little clearer, but I took my time and here it is! It’s sturdy and well made. Fit where I needed it to fit!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Don’t throw out the packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assymble, installed without problems. Next day the units put out a chemical odor? Very pungent chemical smell. I wiped them down with lysol disinfectant wipes and set them outside to see if the odor disipates. I would of sent them back except the asseble was so easy that i threw the packaging material away. Never will I buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ales

customer_reviews.title: Toxic smell!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible toxic smell that will not go away. Yes, looks nice when put together, but the stench is incredible. We left to air out for a week for no avail. Most likely will have to be thrown away. Incredibly disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Russell

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and Missing Holes
customer_reviews.text: This is an inexpensive easy to assemble product when... It comes with all the dowel holes pre-drilled. The right side of the cabinet was missing a straight vertical line of dowel holes. Since I was not about to repack and send this sucker back, I measured and drilled the holes. The material is super thin, so it is spectacularly easy to drill all the way through (see pic). Annoyingly, there is also a defect on the top of the cabinet. Overall, you get what you pay for. Had it come with all the needed holes pre-drilled and without a defect on the top of the cabinet, I'd give this a solid for. As-is, I give it a three...but barely.
customer_reviews.author: the frenchman

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This is short. I’m 4’9 and this thing comes to about my waist area. It was okay to assemble but a week after I put it together everything started to fall apart. I thought it was obstruction but then my husband put it together and it did the same thing. You could go to Ross Burlington or any outlet home store and find something like this or close to it for much cheaper. It is definitely not worth the price height and quality wise.
customer_reviews.author: NikitaSmith01

customer_reviews.title: The toxic odor of this product just awful.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and that it was easy to assemble, but the toxic smell is just awful. I had to leave it in garage for 2 weeks so the smell would go away, and it still there. I'm not sure if this odor is harmful to health, but I'm gonna keep it in garage for few more weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Borodayev

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This storage cabinet is perfect for what I needed, I have a small bathroom with no drawers in my vanity, this fits snuggly and perfectly between my vanity and toilet. The only reason I dint give it 5 starts is because it does have a chemical smell to it as other reviewers have said so I hope it goes away. I do plan on buying another one for our other bathroom since we have the same issue with space. The assembly was easy and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Roper

customer_reviews.title: Looks good....but
customer_reviews.text: Ok. Higher stars because I like the look of this piece in my bathroom. Size is good for next to the toilet. Hold about 4 rolls of toilet paper per drawer. However low stars for value. I get it; it's just wood pegs and plastic cheap board but if you don't follow the directions you end up putting it together 2 or 3x. Looks good. Just wish the price reflected the materials used; which are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I used a little wood glue to make this a little more sturdy but it is nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my closet space
customer_reviews.text: We got three of these drawers and they fit perfectly into the closet space. They are perfect to neatly organize all those little pieces ex. phone accessories, plastic bags, dental care products etc and no one can see the clutter anymore. Super cool product. Love it! Arrived very fast and was in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Maria A.

customer_reviews.title: Package is not a good smell
customer_reviews.text: Item is okay but shipping box and packing foam smelled terrible...had to seal them in plastic to keep my entire house from reeking. Be forewarned!
customer_reviews.author: A Reader

customer_reviews.title: Assembly pieces missing
customer_reviews.text: Probably would of loved this cabinet but have the assembly parts are missing
customer_reviews.author: queenofinsurance

customer_reviews.title: WILL BREAK IF YOU ASSEMBLE ALONE!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT TRY TO ASSEMBLE THIS ALONE! Following the directions, if you try and assemble it alone, the wooden pegs will break off in the pieces (rendering the piece unusable, as there's no way to pull the broken pieces out without shop tools). When you are trying to put the 2nd side on, the pieces used to "hold" the cross bars in place are so fragile and small that they pull on the pressed wood, and split it, with very little pressure. I am sending this back, as there are so many problems with it, I can no longer assemble it (even WITH shop tools). Definitely NOT "easy to assemble."
customer_reviews.author: Ecamacho

customer_reviews.title: Overall good buy!
customer_reviews.text: There were a lot of pieces to assemble, but as long as you follow the instructions it's fine. There was an odor when first opening the box. It goes away. No, I didn't take it outside or anything else. The smell went away halfway through putting it together. After placing it in the bathroom, I sprayed it with lysol and I haven't smelled anything since. The one thing I did not like is drawer size. I thought they would be a little bigger and deeper. It's great for makeup or smaller items. Items like dryers, curling irons, and Instylers take up a lot of room.
customer_reviews.author: Antionette Meridth

customer_reviews.title: Good looking cabinet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in between my toilet and pedistal sink for extra storage. It looks really nice and holds a lot of stuff. I like that the drawers have drawer stops so you can’t pull them out accidentally. It took a while to assemble but was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: MKD66

customer_reviews.title: Great extra bathroom storage
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty challenged when it comes to assembling furniture of any kind. The directions were very basic--with pictures that were pretty small. I was paranoid I'd screw up, so I went very slow and triple checked steps before I did them, Mission accomplished! I think even with going super slow, it took a little over half an hour to assemble. It looks great in my bathroom, very functional. Adds much additional storage. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ann

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This product is actually better quality than I thought it would be! I was expecting something rather cheap that would wiggle every time you opened or closed a drawer, but it’s surprisingly study! I also put this together by myself and didn’t have trouble at all. All the predrilled holes lined up perfectly and the directions were easy to figure out. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible!
customer_reviews.text: When you screw in the long thick screws the board kinda breaks apart. It smell terrible like burnt electrons. And is a weird off white color I'm going to have to paint it to get rid of the terrible smell.
customer_reviews.author: flo

customer_reviews.title: Toxic chemical smell. Returned it.
customer_reviews.text: The smell was awful. I had to put it outside due to the chemical smell that permeated my entire house. I returned it. I wish it would’ve worked out because it was exactly what I wanted the look to be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super bad smell..
customer_reviews.text: Very bad smell that will not leave this product.. can't even bring it in the house..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returning too small
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but too small for what I bought it for which was to hold my hair tools in the bathroom. I wanted to replace the plastic bin storage unit with this because it’s more attractive but it’s much smaller than the other. I may have to return it bc I dont know what else to use it for in my home.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Belcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Storage Solution for Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: I had to declutter what was on top of my dresser and this 4 drawer organizer was simply perfect for my needs! My boyfriend assembled this with ease, he even mentioned the quality and ease of putting this together was much better than IKEA furniture. I definitely recommend this item. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Phill-E

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT recommend
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT white, it’s off white. The worst part is the smell! Made everything I put inside it stink! There’s no getting rid of the strong formaldehyde odor. Better off with a $20 plastic one from Walmart. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Lilskibum

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: It looks great however, setting it up is not worth the money. Had to drill my own holes- the ones they drill for you do not line up correctly. The screws are also super cheap and do not screw in correctly, you will need to use a drill. Material is also cheap. I would have much rather spent a couple extra dollars for better quality material that actually came with correct measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it four stars because it was missing one piece. It was only the decorative bottom part so it still looks nice and is very functional. It comes in several pieces but did not take me long to put together even with just a screwdriver. Seems to be good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Van Leeuwen

customer_reviews.title: Pricey for its quality
customer_reviews.text: Looked a lot bigger in the pictures. Drawers not as big. I feel this is more in the price range of $30-$40 not the price listed. Very easy to put together. I saw one review that mentioned theirs had a odd odor. Mine had a bit of a odor but nothing to the extreme like she mentioned. The quality is not worth the $65.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Have 4.  Love them
customer_reviews.text: I have stuff! Used these in the bathrooms. Fits perfectly into that little niche. Unobtrusive; holds plenty for its size. Deep drawers for my large vitamin bottles. 4 stars because this brand is not really white. It's more of a cream.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: good structure, but odor won't go away!!
customer_reviews.text: The furniture itself is ok, but the product has a very very strong smell, we had to put it in the balcony for three months (!!!!), not we have it inside but whatever we put in it gets this smell, and if we don't open the windows for a couple of days (say when we are away) it gets the smell too. Maybe the specific item was "defective" in that way, but it is very upsetting nevertheless.
customer_reviews.author: Marios

customer_reviews.title: Very very small drawers
customer_reviews.text: It smells funny and will get into any headbands or hair ties you out in the TINY drawers. It works for what I needed it for but if does have a weird chemical smell to it
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie A

customer_reviews.title: Best small Storage cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet is sturdy, easy to put together, smooth drawer opening and closing. Very attractive. I have two in my bathroom. May get another for my closet if I can figure out where, haha. Extremely reasonable. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FEO

customer_reviews.title: Good little cabinets!
customer_reviews.text: FYI... major assembly required. As long as your patient & have the time.... these are pretty good little bedside tables (that what we are using them for) The first one took a while to assemble (learning curve) , the second one took half the time! I used a brad nailer & wood glue during assembly and the finished product is nice & sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, probably wouldn't work for anything with much weight. I use to store extra items like extra box of Q tips etc. My bathroom has one tiny closet and this really helps. It's a good value, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonion Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for odds and ends or anything you want to tuck away.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf super easy to put together love how all the pieces were pack directions simple all bags are label nicely. If I had the option I would have loved it if it had 2 more draws they are nice and deep holds a lot overall I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Ramey, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: nice cabinet
customer_reviews.text: its a nice little cabinet. went together reasonably easy. Drawers were a tiny bit tricky to "start" getting together, once you got the first 2 pieces together, the rest went smoothly. seems sturdy. took about an hour.
customer_reviews.author: D. H. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: For the most part it is a cute cabinet and the drawers slide very well but the nails came through and made holes in the top .
customer_reviews.author: Shari Green

customer_reviews.title: it still ha a smell on it after a few ...
customer_reviews.text: it still ha a smell on it after a few months. been ~2months and it has a lingering scent. it was strong at first but still there currently.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a small space.
customer_reviews.text: It was super easy to put together. It looks good and the paint is even which is usual on this kind of thing. All in I'm impressed. It was just what I needed for the bits and pieces I have left over in my craft supplies.
customer_reviews.author: RollinggirlTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a small powder room. It is pretty cute. But it is on the small and light side. It took my husband 3 hours to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: rxs298

customer_reviews.title: If you’re on the fence, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little set of drawers! Perfect for small spaces as it’s taller and skinnier than your typical set. I had no problem assembling it. I’ve had it about a month now and it’s quite sturdy. Very cute and although I was hesitant about the cost, I don’t regret a single penny I spent on it. It’s actually really reasonably priced, I’m just right with my money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: The instruction book is drawn wrong.
customer_reviews.text: the placement of screws and holes are drawn wrong. Instructions say to drill into 2 middle holes, when in fact the screws and holes are placed on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Muhamed Causevic

customer_reviews.title: Not a true white color - but nice product
customer_reviews.text: Not a true white - more of an off white or ivory color. I purchased to go with the tall white linen closet I purchased for my bathroom and it does not match. However, I like it overall and it seems to be sturdy. It took my husband about an hour to piece together.
customer_reviews.author: Fonzarelli

customer_reviews.title: it is a very small unit.
customer_reviews.text: not what i was expecting, very nice and compact, good made, good material but a very little unit
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A.

customer_reviews.title: Off White
customer_reviews.text: It is a great addition to our bedroom for socks, etc but the color is more of an off white and I thought it was a stark white. A little disappointed that the pictures werent the true color but still love it!
customer_reviews.author: kiersten

customer_reviews.title: visual instructions
customer_reviews.text: The first instruction seemed wrong, but I skipped that part and everything else went fine, When it was necessary to do steop 1 to continue, it was obvious how to continue. Seems fine for intented use
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little thing, worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: It came in a million pieces! I didn’t have the patience for it with a small toddler running around. My roommate put it together within a few hours so make sure you have the time and space bc nothing is together and have to do it all!! Other than that, it works great and amazing for the price. I put it in my bathroom bc the kids would always try to take my stuff and play with it. So I opted for something with drawers that may be a littler harder to open for them!! They don’t even try now to get into my stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my vanity.
customer_reviews.text: Love these little drawer cabinets! I purchased 2 to use as makeup.storage with a vanity. Very attractive & sturdy. Wish the drawer bottoms were same material as sides & front (they're very firm cardboard type), but will still hold decent weight limit. Assembly was easy & parts packaged & labelled well. Different sizes are available from this manufacturer. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amapit

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage cabinet
customer_reviews.text: I use this in the bathroom and it provides an alternate storage instead of cramming stuff into a closet . It is not very deep but I wouldn't take away a star because the demensions were in the description. It won't hold a curling iron but great for all that other little stuff one has in a bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: beccab107

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to fit in my granddaughter's closet to hold some clothing items. She is 7 years old so I didn't want anything to tall, and I didn't want the item take up to much space. This cabinet fit perfectly! The item was easy to put together, and well constructed. And unlike some of the other reviews I saw, had no bad smell at all! I am very happy with this purchase and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Shipley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly between our washer and dryer for misc laundry room storage! I wish it was a little deeper, but I bought it knowing its measurements and what to expect! We loved it so much; we bought a second to use as our toddler’s dresser! She loves it! It's cute, and the perfect size for her!
customer_reviews.author: Momma Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I anticipted & lingering chemical smell.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together and came without damage. However, about a month or so later it still has a lingering chemical smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever. Debating on returning. I assembled it, which was not easy at all and it is completely falling apart. Not only was it way over due to be delivered (1 week late) but it does not stay together and is not worth the money. I wish I went to Walmart and bought something there instead. Might take it all apart and return it. worst purchase ever. OH and the measurements are not correct. It does not fit where I planned even after using a tape measure to make sure it would.
customer_reviews.author: Caila Plocharczyk

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble but smells horrible for days
customer_reviews.text: East to assemble, but the wood smelled so strongly of chemicals that my hands smelled after putting it together. It is outside, airing out, for the second day in a row. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: William Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but cant get past the smell!
customer_reviews.text: The product is so easy to put together. It was perfect height and storage for what I needed to for. BUT the SMELL was so bad! It's now sitting on my front porch waiting to be returned because it cant even sit in my house! DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THIS PRODUCT!!
customer_reviews.author: Yarnicorn

customer_reviews.title: holy moly
customer_reviews.text: be prepared, there are seriously at least 50 pieces. I don't have that kinda patience
customer_reviews.author: Tanners Mom

customer_reviews.title: Cute. East to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Typical bathroom Shelving unit. Not super durable but good for makeup storage which is what I will use it for. Took me about an hour to assemble. Wish the drawers were a bit bigger but that’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Zapporay

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet fits perfectly in my bathroom! I’ve hated the functionality of my bathroom since I’ve moved to my new place but this cabinet fixed all my issues. I can store all my toiletries. If you have a small bathroom I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Theya

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with side panel damaged
customer_reviews.text: Took about an hour by myself to assemble. Unfortunately the left panel arrived damaged. Has chips of paint missing. Cosmetically it is not okay but structurally it serves its' purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Jen W.

customer_reviews.title: Fits my space nicely and is attractive
customer_reviews.text: Needed an organizer and wanted to get good value and solid product. Succeeded. Assembly required and some know how.
customer_reviews.author: ABBA

customer_reviews.title: Not Quality materials and small. Side panel cracked in assembly grrr!  Looks like kids furniture
customer_reviews.text: Not much quality the side panel split trying to make a bad oversized dowel fit in a badly drilled hole! Now what I have to disassemble d try to rebid to make a return. Not a happy Red Head
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but not a bright white like I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with another furniture piece in my bathroom. The designs were almost identical so I was thrilled to have found it. However, it is not a bright white like my other piece or even the toilet. Instead, it is slightly off-white. It also arrived dirty (one piece was covered in dirt or sand?). On its own, it might look great, but the off-white is a bummer when trying to match pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marten

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cabinet. I have 1 in all of my bathrooms and love the versatility and the look goes with all our different themes. I use these for organizing many different items.
customer_reviews.author: Liz G.

customer_reviews.title: Good cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Seems a slightly cheap. Drawer slides are just plastic and the sides are very thin. So far it is holding up well. Color is also slightly yellow/off white.
customer_reviews.author: dk409

customer_reviews.title: Great size and strong. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great for the bathroom or a gap between appliances in the kitchen. Could be a good makeup vanity storage too.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect size to fit in my bathroom. It is very clean and neat looking and was very easy to put together. It also hold quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Nice for extra storage
customer_reviews.text: I put this together myself in a couple of hours and it wasn’t hard at all. I use it for extra storage in bathroom and it perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ds2013

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for extra bathroom storage. For the price, it is very nice. Most all of the pieces fit together tightly with no gaps. It was easy to assemble, and only took about 20 minutes. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Twotone74

customer_reviews.title: Smelly garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Do. It but this product. It smelled of fermaldahyde. I thought if I aired it out for two days it would be better but no luck. I was not about to have that smell in my house forever. Absolutely not worth the money. I sent mine back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and very time consuming to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I’m being punked! This came in over 100 pieces! How? Do not get this product. It took me 3 hours to assemble. It’s worse than IKEA. Once I was done the whole base came apart in an instant. My husband thought I did something wrong and re-read the directions and reassembled. It still just fell apart. The drawers don’t have tracks to they just get shoved in. The whole thing is awful. Wasted an entire night. Now returning fully assembled will be a pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Sanfemio

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are RIGHT - Smell is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Thought we would give it a try, the size was exactly what we needed. Unfortunately, all the reviews about the smell are correct. Tried bleaching and putting outside two days in a row, and the smell still stuck around. For a bathroom product, the smell was not something we could make an exception for. Disappointing, but amazon handled refund request very well.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Small but great.
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought but it works great to store my shipping things for Etsy. It was really easy to put together too.
customer_reviews.author: LovelyPinkMaree

customer_reviews.title: MISSING HOLES. ASSEMBLY WAS HELL
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT WAS MISSING HOLES. When building it, I had to make my own holes. I did not have a drill and the hole making was hard to do without. I put it together with glue after making several attempts to reach out to the department for a refund. I WOULD LIKE A REFUND. IT FELL APART IN 1 DAY
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Treebush

customer_reviews.title: Lots to assemble but very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice once assembled. Was not too happy that everything had to be assembled, even the drawers but I was able to do it on my own. Looks very nice in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Melendez

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cute piece, and functional
customer_reviews.text: the plastic pieces that keep the drawers in should be made out of aa stronger material.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Goods
customer_reviews.text: Received item with lots of scratches and nicks. I put it together regardless hoping the imperfections would be hidden but they are blatant. Wasted my money. Not sure I want to go through the hassle of shipping back and refunding. Too much work,
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect lil drawers for the bathroom - they're super tiny drawers but, there are 5 of them so that helps. Fits in our bathroom and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: T. Carlile

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for?
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, I looked at other types for the space I was putting it in. I bought it anyway. It isn't *horrible*, but yes it does have a smell, yes it isn't very sturdy, and yes its a pain to put together. But once it was set in place and filled up - it looks good, hasn't had any issues. The manufacturer really should look into that chemical smell though...
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B.

customer_reviews.title: Good little book for extra stuff
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in a hallway corner. Firs all my extra hair supplies and make up.
customer_reviews.author: Howsy

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for inexpensive storage solution in a spare bathroom. It is a perfect fit, stable and nice looking, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: CHERI TUCKETT

customer_reviews.title: THIS CABINET IS NOT WHITE.
customer_reviews.text: If you want a white/white don't get this, it is more eggshell/off-white.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and well made!
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and is well made. Directions are not great but I figured it out by counting the number of bolts/screws and matching them up with pre-drilled holes. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: becky terry

customer_reviews.title: Terrible chemical smell doesn't go away!!!
customer_reviews.text: The chemical smell is ridiculous! Have had it for almost 2 weeks, washed it down twice, and the smell is still terrible! Anything you put in drawers absorbs the odor! Do not purchase!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: It's been 10 months since I bought this unit. The odor still linger. Everything inside the drawers are tainted with the bad smell. I have to get rid of it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Lo

customer_reviews.title: Strong and sterdy
customer_reviews.text: We use this for added storage in my Mom’s bathroom at her care center.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, clean, elegant, slightly smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I like this drawer set alot. It holds a good amount of makeup, but it was a little smaller than I expected considering the price. I bought it match a standing cabinet I had bought and it turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gillyweed

customer_reviews.title: Adorable cabinet
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to assemble, my daughter did that by herself. The instruction is pretty clear. The material is good, pretty strong build. It’s so stylish and modern. I put it next to my daughter's study desk. Hopefully, it will help her organize her stuff. It’s smaller than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Indy W

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Just the right fit for a small space. I use it in my small clothes closet.
customer_reviews.author: Holly from South Texas

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHITE, it’s an off white
customer_reviews.text: Overall a decent product to buy, I’m not one to complain but I’m not to happy with the color. The product was advertised as a white, and it’s actually like an eggshell color. Probably would not have bought if it said off white. BUT other than that it’s a pretty good addition to my bathroom. D
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T.

customer_reviews.title: Use as nightstand.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up using this as a night stand. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Only diagrams for assembly. Some a bit confusing. Would be easier with directions and diagrams. Perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits what I've been looking for. Little taller than my counter, keeps my things tidy. Wish it came in a natural looking wood.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Isaacson

customer_reviews.title: Odor
customer_reviews.text: It's such a pretty storage cabinet BUt the disadvantage of it is how it isn't sturdy enough but I'm pretty sure you can solve that another way, but the biggest disadvantage is the strong odor of chemicals and paint that it comes with. Not sure if it's harmful but that's it :/
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, I’d buy it again!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Just the right size for my small bathroom. Nice style and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Presentation
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it’s a nice addition to my sewing room.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry E Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Complex assembly
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took way too long and was complicated. Once it was put together it’s awesome quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I love these storage cabinets. They are perfect for the little things that need organizing.
customer_reviews.author: Miss M

product_meta.title: Homfa Bathroom Floor Cabinet, Wooden Free Standing Storage Cabinet Side Organizer Unit with 4 Drawer, White
feature_bullets: HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL: Made of high grade solid MDF material, and the floor cabinet storage with four drawers, with open drawer design make you can easy open and close them. Comes with pure white finish, this storage cabinet is stable, durable, well made and looks elegant.

MULTIPURPOSE:The cabinet combined with modern style and ample storage space for bedroom, bathroom, kitchen and other occasions. Features enclosed four large drawers to place towels, soap, tissues and other decorative items.

SAVE SPACE: The free standing storage cabinet can be used in bathroom,kitchen or balcony, 4 large drawers provides extra storage without taking up valuable space,the drawers can be opened or closed smoothly,you could also place on the the top of this unit.
EASY TO INSTALL：This cabinet unit is easy to assemble and all mounting hardware is included.
DIMENSION:Floor Standing Storage Unit Size: 11.8*11.8*32.3 inch(30*30*82cm)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars482 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
